channel.title: blog on The Green Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in blog on The Green Notebook

item.title: Reasons
item.description: Hi everyone. Let’s start again. As you can see, I am back again, I’ve never been really focused on this blog but I think I need to get focused on my things. I have been working a lot the last few months and I realised noone is going to say thanks for working hard. I love to work and I don’t mind spending lots of hours working but, like everyone, I want to hear nice words sometimes.
